src:
Prediksi Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan 6 November 2019
04 Nov 2019, 16:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund mengusung misi pembalasan saat meladeni Inter Milan di kandang sendiri. Itu sangat diperlukan demi menjaga kans untuk bersaing di grup berat yang juga dihuni Barcelona ini.
Borussia Dortmund akan menjamu Inter Milan di Signal Iduna Park pada matchday 4 Grup F Liga Champions 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Pada matchday sebelumnya, Dortmund menyerah 0-2 di markas Inter. Gol-gol Lautaro Martinez dan Antonio Candreva memaksa Dortmund takluk di hadapan Inter.
Dortmund ingin membalasnya. Pasalnya, saat ini memiliki poin yang sama dengan Inter (4) dan tertinggal dari Barcelona (7). Jika sampai kalah lagi, Marco Reus dan kawan-kawan bakal berada di posisi yang kurang menguntungkan.
Dortmund dan Inter sama-sama menatap duel ini dengan modal kemenangan dalam dua laga terakhir.
Dortmund baru saja berturut-turut menaklukkan Borussia Monchengladbach 2-1 di ajang DFB Pokal dan menang 3-0 menjamu Wolfsburg di Bundesliga. Gol perdana Thorgan Hazard, finishing Raphael Guerreiro, serta penalti Mario Gotze membawa Dortmund menumbangkan Wolfsburg dan mendongkrak kepercayaan diri jelang laga kontra sang wakil Italia.
Sementara itu, Inter berturut-turut menang dengan skor identik 2-1 atas tuan rumah Brescia dan Bologna di Serie A. Lautaro Martinez mencetak satu gol dalam dua laga Inter tersebut, sedangkan Romelu Lukaku menyumbang tiga.
Laga Dortmund kontra Inter di Jerman ini nanti sepertinya bakal berlangsung ketat.
text:
Prediction Borussia Dortmund vs Inter Milan 6 November 2019
Nov 04 2019, 16:16 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Borussia Dortmund carries out a retaliatory mission while serving Inter Milan at home. It is very necessary to keep the chance to compete in this heavy group that is also inhabited by Barcelona.
Borussia Dortmund will host Inter Milan at Signal Iduna Park on Matchday 4 in Group F of the 2019/20 Champions League, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
On the previous matchday, Dortmund surrendered 0-2 at the Inter headquarters. Goals from Lautaro Martinez and Antonio Candreva forced Dortmund to fall before Inter.
Dortmund wants to reply. Because, currently has the same points with Inter (4) and left behind Barcelona (7). If you lose again, Marco Reus and his friends will be in a disadvantage.
Dortmund and Inter are both looking at this duel with a capital of victory in the last two matches.
Dortmund have just successively conquered Borussia Monchengladbach 2-1 in the DFB Pokal and won 3-0 to host Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga. Thorgan Hazard's inaugural goal, Raphael Guerreiro's finishing, and Mario Gotze's penalty led Dortmund to subvert Wolfsburg and boost confidence ahead of the match against the Italian representative.
Meanwhile, Inter won consecutive with a score of identical 2-1 over hosts Brescia and Bologna in Serie A. Lautaro Martinez scored one goal in the two Inter matches, while Romelu Lukaku contributed three.
Dortmund match counter Inter in Germany later this will likely take place tight.
